mapper.insert: insert into member(userid, name, pwd, zip, juso, juso_etc, phone, email, joinday, birth) values (#{userid},#{name},#{pwd},#{zip},#{juso},#{juso_etc},#{phone},#{email},now(),#{birth})
mapper.select: select count(*) as cnt from member where userid=#{param1}
